ProductInfo.Features:
Always keep an eye on the situation with remote monitoring via network or 3G mobile technology
The IP66 rated cameras come equipped with 1/4" CMOS sensor, 21 IR LEDs and mechanical IR cut filter to produce high quality image in both day and night
The powerful system packs a good list of features to facilitate your setup and operation, as well as optimize its performance and function
Watermark: Editable watermark name
Smart Backup: Support external DVD-RW, Hard Drive (Up to 2TB, FAT 32) and USB flash drive
ProductInfo.Name: Rosewill RSVA-12001 8 Channel and 4 x 1/4-Inch CMOS, 21 IR LED, IR Cut Filter Bullet Cameras DVR Kit (Black)
